content.p: How to gain access to our corporate applications. From 25 November 2024, the systems detailed on this page will start to be replaced by our new HR, Finance and Procurement system, UniCore. Many of these systems are already read-only. You can view details about UniCore here. Unit4 Business World (Agresso) is used for financial management and procurement. It can be accessed using a browser, or core financial staff can have the program installed on their computer. Resourcelink is the University's HR/Payroll application which authorised managers are able to use to view current employment information about staff in their area. MyView is a web-based system which gives employees direct access to view and update some of the personal data that the University holds about them. Vacancy Manager is used for Vacancy Management and is a web-based e-recruitment system. Workload Planner is used for recording how academic workloads are allocated to academic staff.
